label: Garden Maintenance
title: Garden maintenance that keeps everything looking cared for
description: Regular, reliable visits to keep your garden tidy, healthy, and consistently presentable—without the stress of falling behind.

hero.imageAlt: Well-kept garden with trimmed hedges and neat borders after maintenance
hero.caption: A consistent tidy-up makes the whole space feel better.

included.label: What’s included
included.title: The routine jobs that keep a garden in shape
included.description: We focus on the essentials: tidy beds, neat edges, sensible pruning, and a clean finish—plus practical advice when you want it.

items.title: General tidy & reset
items.description: A quick refresh that makes everything feel looked after.

items.title: Borders & edging
items.description: Crisp edges that instantly lift the look of a garden.

items.title: Light pruning (as needed)
items.description: Small trims to keep growth under control and tidy.

items.title: Green waste removal (optional)
items.description: Clippings and waste can be collected and taken away.

items.title: Season-aware advice
items.description: Simple next-step guidance to keep things manageable.

plans.label: Regular care
plans.title: Choose a maintenance schedule that suits you
plans.description: Weekly, fortnightly, or seasonal visits—pick what keeps your garden looking the way you want, without overdoing it.

valueBand.label: Value
valueBand.title: A garden that stays tidy without the hassle
valueBand.description: The goal is consistency: a clear plan, reliable visits, and a finish that makes your whole property feel better kept.

bullets.title: Looks cared for
bullets.description: Small details add up—beds, borders, and structure feel sharper.

bullets.title: Easier upkeep

faq.label: FAQs
faq.title: Quick answers
faq.description: If you don’t see your question here, just get in touch.

items.question: What’s included in garden maintenance?
items.answer: It depends on your garden, but typically bed care, weeding, light pruning, tidy edges, and a clean finish. We’ll confirm details in your quote.

items.question: Do you offer regular visits?
items.answer: Yes—weekly, fortnightly, monthly, and seasonal options depending on the time of year and what you want maintained.

items.question: Can you remove green waste?
items.answer: Yes—waste removal can be included. Let us know what you’d like taken away when requesting a quote.

items.question: Can you do a one-off tidy?
items.answer: Yes—one-off resets are available, especially as a starting point before regular maintenance.

items.question: Do you cover my area?
items.answer: Send your postcode and we’ll confirm availability.

finalCta.title: Want your garden to stay tidy all season?
finalCta.description: Tell us what you want maintained and how often—then we’ll recommend a schedule and quote it clearly.
